titleStmt.title: The case of ministring at the communion-table when there is no Eucharist stated and discussed, upon occasion of a treatise entitled, Parish churches turn'd into conventicles, &c. : together with some preliminary reflections made upon two papers in answer to that treatise.
titleStmt.author: T. A.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Ralph Holt, for Obadiah Blagrave ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
